modName: Spooky Edits - Darker Dawnguard Armor and Weapons (WIP)
summary: Darker textures for the Dawnguard (vampire hunters, not the whole mod) armors and shields, as well as the dog armor.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] I wanted something a bit darker for hunting pesky wabbits.. I mean vampires. Also some darker weapons for killing them with (Added after initial batch of screenshots).

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Lossless Versions :[/b][/color] These 24/32bit versions give a nicer depth to the textures and should be free from any artifacts, but are much more memory intensive so if you are already low on V-RAM then avoid :).

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] Since this is only a texture replacing mod you can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] I used the lossless version of these textures alongside an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url].

[center]
[color=Lightsteelblue][b](: More Spooky Edits :)[/b][/color]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57178/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57639/?]Darker Ebony Weapons[/url]
[/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57178/?]Darker Robes[/url][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55725/?]Darker Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Armor and Robes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56654/?]Darker Thieves Guild Armor[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56610/?]
Darker Jester Clothes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56587/?]Darker Mehrunes Razor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55809/]Reworked Vanilla Female Shrouded Armor Texture Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54816/?]Darker Vampire Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54998/?]Glass Weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54641/?]Darker Falmer Armors and Weapons[/url][/center]
author: SpookyMunky
